rules_text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, you may exile it. If you do, create a token that's a copy of it except it is an enchantment. [i](It still has its abilities, but it's not a creature or other types.)[/i]
flavor_text:
[i]“We cannot survive a war with nature. Only when we are at peace, we can finally grow.”
—Golna, the First Shah[/i]
